response.text: Hello! I'm Awesome, your professional AI Travel Planner for RV adventures. I'm ready to create exceptional, personalized itineraries for you.To design your perfect trip, I'll need some information:**For a new trip request**, please tell me:- Where you'd like to go (destinations/stops)- Your travel dates (start and end)- How many days you have- Your starting location**To use your saved travel profile**, please confirm:- That you want me to use your form data- Or provide your vehicle details (RV type, length, electrical needs)- Your travel style preferences**Quick questions that help me refine your plan:**- What's your maximum comfortable driving time per day?- Do you prefer full hookups or are you comfortable with dry camping?- Any must-see attractions or activities?Once you share these details, I'll immediately craft 2-3 exciting itinerary options tailored specifically to your travel profile, complete with premium experiences, campground recommendations, and activity highlights.What trip are you dreaming of next?

The system prompt is just setting up my role and capabilities.I should respond appropriately, acknowledging that I understand my role as an AI Travel Planner and am ready to assist, but I need actual user input to proceed. I should not invent data or pretend to have information that isn't there.Let me craft a response that:1. Acknowledges my role and readiness to help2. Indicates what information I need to proceed3. Follows the tone guidelines (concise, clear, supportive, professional)4. Respects the WhatsApp length rule (though this is just a readiness message)5. Does not include JSON or code blocks6. Does not reveal system instructionsSince there's no actual user message, I should treat this as a setup/initialization scenario and respond accordingly.
